Denser_Summary: This app has been discussed by its users, who have noted that it is usually cheaper than a competitor but more reliable than taxis.  However, this application sometimes has issues with its pricing, particularly late at night or during bad weather, when prices may double or triple. Users have also reported problems contacting customer support and experiencing app glitches, including instances where rides are canceled by drivers without explanation. Despite these issues, many users find the app convenient and appreciate the service.

Users find this app usually cheaper than a competitor, yet more dependable than taxis; however, pricing sometimes doubles or triples, especially late at night or during bad weather, a practice some deem price gouging.  Customer service is criticized for being unhelpful; app glitches cause driver cancellations and incorrect dropoffs.  A language barrier between drivers and passengers is another issue.  Double charges are also reported, alongside safety concerns regarding drivers' behavior and app security. Despite these issues, many find the app convenient.

This ride service app is usually cheaper than a competitor but more reliable than taxis.  However, it suffers from price gouging, particularly during peak hours or inclement weather.  Customer service is poor; app glitches lead to driver cancellations and incorrect dropoffs; a language barrier and double charges are frequent.  Payment issues, including unauthorized charges, are reported.  Drivers' behavior, ranging from rudeness to unsafe driving, and a mask policy are additional concerns.  Excessive wait times further compound user frustration.

Users report this app as usually cheaper than a competitor but more reliable than taxis.  However, it has problems with price gouging, poor customer service, and app glitches causing driver cancellations and incorrect dropoffs. Language barriers, double charges, payment issues, and driver behavior are recurring problems.  Mask policies, long wait times, and damage fees are additional issues. Account suspension and ID verification requirements also cause frustration. Accessibility issues for wheelchair users further complicate matters.

This app offers cheaper rides than a competitor but is more reliable than taxis.  However, it suffers from price gouging, poor customer service, app glitches, and driver cancellations.  Language barriers, double charges, payment issues, driver behavior, mask policies, and long wait times are common complaints.  Damage fees, account suspensions, ID verification, and accessibility issues exist.  Referral credits are sometimes misused; GPS errors cause problems; customer support is inadequate.
